# CUSA17962.savepatch

### 1. Untested - Make sure to backup your save data first
### 2. Inf Silencer (Must have one, Must Use Load Save)

Target File: `*`

```
80010010 5A896447
3E303014 00000000
00000000 00000000
28000018 000000FF
80020010 5A896447
3E303014 00000000
00000000 00000000
28000018 000000FF
```
